DOCNAME: CASE OF DJIDROVSKI v. "THE FORMER YUGOSLAV REPUBLIC OF MACEDONIA"
CONCLUSION: Violation of P1-1;Non-pecuniary damage - finding of violation sufficient;Costs and expenses (Convention proceedings) - claim dismissed
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE . He worked as a pilot in ORG until he retired in DATE .

CARDINAL . NORP In former GPE , the citizens used to pay a tax for housing . On the basis of the accumulated funds the ORG constructed “ socially owned ” apartments which were then rented to individuals at legally fixed rates .

CARDINAL . ORG was the single army on the territory of the former GPE governed by laws which were applicable throughout former GPE . The applicant , as an officer of ORG , paid DATE contributions from his salary to ORG for the construction of army apartments . All army servicemen were entitled to live in army apartments as tenants .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant ceased to be an active officer of ORG under an early retirement scheme . At that time , he lived in GPE , as a tenant in an apartment which belonged to the army . On an unspecified date the applicant , having found a job in GPE , sought to obtain the tenancy of an army apartment there . In DATE , under an agreement between ORG and ORG , GPE ( at that time a member of ORG ) obtained the possession of the applicant ’s army apartment in GPE in exchange for an apartment in GPE , which remained the property of GPE but was to be used by ORG . In DATE the applicant moved into the apartment in GPE .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG of the Socialist GPE enacted a Law on Housing of the Army Servicemen ( ORG за станбено обезбедување во ЈНА ) ( the “ Z.S.О.J.N.A. ” ) , according to which army servicemen , current and retired , could purchase apartments in which they lived with a price adjustment for the amount of the paid contributions for the construction of army apartments and for development of the construction land . Section CARDINAL of that law provides that the same purchase conditions apply to apartments which do not belong to the army , as it was in the case of the applicant . According to regulations issued by ORG , the price difference was to be paid by the federal army ( see paragraphs CARDINAL - CARDINAL below ) .

CARDINAL . Following the fall of GPE and a referendum held on DATE , the former GPE declared independence . On CARDINAL DATE it adopted LAW ( Устав на РМ ) and the PERSON on the Implementation of the LAW ( Уставен Закон за спроведување на Уставот ) . According to the LAW the laws from former GPE remain in force , except for the laws regulating the organisation and competence of the former NORP federal organs . On DATE the NORP President and the General of ORG concluded an agreement for the withdrawal of ORG from NORP territory .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG concluded an ORG ( ORG за правата и обврските во врска со примопредажбата на недвижностите на територија на ORG ) ( “ the S.P.O.V.P.N.T.R.M. ” ) with ORG . According to this agreement ORG took over all the obligations of ORG in respect of army apartments , including the obligation to sell these apartments with a price reduction . ORG in DATE and DATE enacted regulations implementing this agreement . In DATE ORG of the Apartments Obtained by LAW from ORG ( ORG за продажба на државниот стамбен фонд наследен од ЈНА ) ( “ U.P.D.S.F.N.J.A. ” ) , according to which present and former army servicemen living in apartments owned by ORG , could purchase them under the ORG

CARDINAL . From ORG decision of DATE it appears that the ORG exchanged the title of its apartments which were inhabited by civilians with the title of the apartments owned by ORG ( “ ПУИГ ” ) which were inhabited by servicemen . Thereby , the servicemen were able to exercise the right under the Z.S.O.J.N.A. to purchase the apartments at a reduced price . However , this exchange was limited and concerned CARDINAL apartments owned by ORG and CARDINAL owned by ORG . No details were provided as to the criteria concerning the exchange .

CARDINAL . In DATE an amended version of the DATE Law on the Sale of Socially Owned Apartments ( ORG за продажба на станови во општествена сопственост ) ( “ the Z.P.S.O.S. ” ) was promulgated in ORG . Under the law their tenants were entitled to purchase them on credit and at a beneficial price . Unlike the Z.S.О.J.N.A. , the law did not provide for a price adjustment for the amount of the contributions made towards the construction of “ socially owned ” apartments and the development of the construction land , despite the fact that the tenants had also paid them .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG abrogated the Z.S.O.J.N.A. without retroactive effect and the respective Government ’s Regulations on the ground that they had been contrary to the DATE LAW . In particular , the court stated that : ( a ) ORG , its “ housing fund ” and the “ social ownership ” no longer existed ; ( b ) the DATE LAW had abolished all the privileges enjoyed by army servicemen ; and ( c ) the Z.S.O.J.N.A. had created an unequal treatment in comparison to the citizens who were entitled to purchase their apartments under the Z.P.S.O.S. The PERSON was not mentioned in ORG decision .

CARDINAL . DATE , the applicant requested ORG to purchase the apartment in GPE where he had been living since DATE as a tenant of ORG in accordance with the Z.S.О.J.N.A. and the U.P.D.S.F.N.J.A. ORG informed him , and CARDINAL other servicemen of the former ORG , that the examination of their requests had been postponed due to some formalities .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant and CARDINAL other persons asked ORG to examine the compatibility of the Z.P.S.O.S. and the relevant regulations issued by ORG with the Z.S.O.J.N.A. On DATE this was refused by ORG .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant submitted another request to purchase the apartment to the President of the Republic who transmitted it to ORG .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG informed the applicant that his request to purchase the apartment had been dismissed on the ground that the U.P.D.S.F.N.J.A. did not apply to apartments other than those which belonged to ORG . In particular , ORG stressed that LAW of the DATE Regulation on the Sale of Apartments for which GPE PERSON за продажба на становите на кои права , должности и одговорности во поглед на располагањето има ORG ( “ NORP ” ) provided that the U.P.D.S.F.N.J.A. did not apply to apartments for official use of the Government . ORG argued that on DATE the Government had taken a similar position in respect of this issue . Therefore , the applicant would have had the right to purchase the apartment under the U.P.D.S.F.N.J.A. only if it had concerned an apartment owned by the said Ministry .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant instituted proceedings before ORG ( PERSON суд GPE I ) against ORG , requesting that the apartment be sold to him under an adjusted price in accordance with the Z.S.О.J.N.A. He also invoked Articles CARDINAL and CARDINAL of the Law on the Implementation of the LAW .

CARDINAL . On DATE the court granted the applicant ’s request . The court stated , inter alia , that the applicant , as an army officer , had the right to purchase the apartment under an adjusted price . In particular , the purchase price should be reduced by the revalorised amount of the DATE contributions which the applicant had paid to ORG for the construction of apartments and for development of construction land . ORG found that ORG was under an obligation to pay the price difference for the apartment .
CARDINAL . ORG appealed against this decision on grounds that in accordance with a Government Decision the Z.S.О.J.N.A. only applied to apartments owned by ORG .

CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG ( NORP суд GPE ) upheld the decision of the lower court on the ground that the applicant , as a former officer of ORG , had paid contributions for the construction of army apartments and , therefore , was entitled to purchase an apartment under an adjusted price in accordance with the Z.S.О.J.N.A. The court held , inter alia , that the lower court had reasoned correctly when it had connected the benefit of purchasing an apartment under an adjusted price to the status of the applicant as a former army officer , who had been paying contributions , and not to the identity of the owner of the said apartment .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant and the Government concluded a purchase contract for the apartment on the basis of the Municipal and Appellate Courts’ judgments . The applicant thus purchased the apartment with a price reduced by the amount of contributions he had paid to the former ORG . On DATE the ORG authorised the contract .

CARDINAL . From the copy of CARDINAL document issued by ORG претпријатие за стопанисување со стамбен и деловен простор на Република Македонија ) , it may be deduced that the applicant paid for the apartment in DATE at the latest . It is not clear whether later ORG reimbursed ORG the price difference for the apartment .
CARDINAL . In the meantime , ORG filed an appeal on points of law ( ревизија ) with ORG ( FAC суд PERSON ) against the judgment of ORG DATE .
CARDINAL . Upon the appeal on DATE ORG quashed the lower court ’s judgment and dismissed the applicant ’s request to purchase the apartment for a reduced price .

CARDINAL . ORG noted that in accordance with LAW on LAW of the former GPE the federal laws of former GPE remained in force as NORP laws provided that they were harmonised with LAW . The powers which were previously exercised by the federal organs were allocated to the bodies of the former GPE . The Z.S.O.J.N.A. remained in force as NORP law .

CARDINAL . ORG found that under the Z.S.O.J.N.A. it was for ORG to make up for the price difference for the adjustment of the prices of the apartments which were not owned by ORG . However , on CARDINAL DATE the former GPE enacted its LAW and became an independent ORG . Since then there was ORG nor was its housing fund on the territory of the former GPE . Therefore , the applicant could not have the price for his apartment reduced as there was ORG to cover the price difference .

CARDINAL . The court did not mention at all the decision of ORG and the S.P.O.V.P.N.T.R.M. Nor did it mention that the applicant had already purchased the apartment by contract , or that ORG had exchanged a number of apartments owned by ORG and inhabited by other servicemen . The applicant was served with ORG judgment on DATE .

CARDINAL . The parties have not indicated whether the applicant was formally registered as the owner of the apartment in ORG ( ORG завод за геодетски работи ) after their purchase agreement had been authorised by ORG in DATE . From the documents it appears the applicant had already recorded his title over the apartment . In addition , the parties have not indicated whether the ORG have taken any legal action to enforce ORG judgment of DATE , for example by bringing proceedings for the rescission of the DATE purchase agreement ( see paragraphs CARDINAL below ) . There is no information that such proceedings have ever been instituted .
CARDINAL . The applicant still lives in the apartment in question .
CARDINAL . LAW provides , as far as relevant , that ORG decides on the conformity of laws with LAW .
CARDINAL . LAW § CARDINAL provides , inter alia , that the ORG shall repeal or invalidate a law if it determines that it does not conform to LAW .
DATE . LAW provides that the decisions of the ORG shall be final and executive .
CARDINAL . Section CARDINAL provides that all issues of succession arising out of the break - up of GPE shall be regulated by way of treaties with the other former GPE .

CARDINAL . Section CARDINAL § § CARDINAL and CARDINAL provide that the existing federal laws of former GPE shall be in force in the former GPE with the exception of the laws regulating the organisation and competence of the NORP federal organs .
CARDINAL . Section CARDINAL provides that all federal laws which are inconsistent with LAW shall be amended accordingly within DATE from DATE when the LAW was promulgated .
CARDINAL . Section CARDINAL provides that the law in question regulates the housing of present and former ORG servicemen and their families .

CARDINAL . Section CARDINAL § CARDINAL provides that the purchase price for an apartment owned by ORG shall be determined on the basis of the apartment ’s re - assessed construction value , its quality , equipment , location and other similar factors . The price thus determined shall be reduced by the amortisation of the apartment , but not PERCENT of the total amount of amortisation .

CARDINAL . Section CARDINAL § CARDINAL provides that when an apartment is purchased by an active or retired army serviceman , the purchase price shall be reduced by the adjusted ( re - assessed ) amount of the DATE contributions paid by the servicemen for construction of army apartments and improvement of construction land .

CARDINAL . Section CARDINAL provides that when an army serviceman mentioned in LAW § CARDINAL wishes to purchase an apartment which is not owned by the army , the army shall pay to the owner of the apartment the price difference between the adjusted and the normal purchase price .

CARDINAL . According to LAW of that agreement , concluded between ORG and the former ORG , army apartments should be sold to army servicemen under the conditions set forth in the DATE former PERSON on ORG ( Z.S.O.J.N.A. ) .
CARDINAL . Section CARDINAL of the said agreement provides that the former ORG shall not have any right to impose further obligations on ORG after the signing of the agreement .

CARDINAL . Section CARDINAL provides that all other rights and obligations which the former ORG had on the territory of the former GPE until DATE in connection with real property , housing fund and business premises owned by it shall be transferred to ORG .

CARDINAL . Section CARDINAL of the Law on Defence ( ORG за одбрана ) provides that real property which was owned by the former ORG on the territory of the former GPE shall become the property of the former GPE .

CARDINAL . Section CARDINAL provides that this law regulates the conditions , manner and procedure for the sale of socially owned apartments . The law does not provide for a price adjustment for the amount of the paid contributions for the construction of “ socially owned ” apartments and for development of the construction land .
CARDINAL . Section CARDINAL provides that a decision to sell the ( socially ) owned apartment will be issued by its owner ( the ORG ) within DATE from DATE when this law enters into force .
CARDINAL . Section CARDINAL § CARDINAL provides that the socially owned apartment may be sold to the tenant of that apartment or to members of his family .

CARDINAL . Section CARDINAL § CARDINAL provides that if the owner of the apartment ( the ORG ) does not issue a decision to sell that apartment within the time limit specified in LAW , then the holder of tenancy right may within DATE request the appropriate court to issue a decision in non - contentious civil proceedings to replace the sale contract .

CARDINAL . The law does not provide for a price adjustment for the amount of the paid contributions for the construction of “ socially owned ” apartments and for development of the construction land .
CARDINAL . Section CARDINAL provided that the filed appeal on points ( ревизија ) of law does not adjourn the execution of judgment against which it has been filed .

CARDINAL . Section CARDINAL provided that parties may present new facts and introduce new evidence in the proceedings only if these concern essential violations of the provisions for civil procedure for which an appeal on points of law is permitted .

CARDINAL . Section CARDINAL provided that ORG may dismiss an appeal on points of law as unfounded if it determines that the grounds it must examine ex officio , or which were included in the appeal , are ill - founded .

CARDINAL . Section CARDINAL § CARDINAL provided that when ORG finds that the substantive provisions of an act are wrongly applied by the lower courts , it shall grant the appeal on points of law ( ревизија ) and deliver a judgment on the merits .
CARDINAL . Section CARDINAL § CARDINAL provides that the lawful acquiring of ownership over a property does not have any bearing on the rights of other persons over that property .

CARDINAL . Section CARDINAL § CARDINAL provides that the ownership title over real estate obtained by a legal act is acquired by recording that right ( act ) in the public records for registering real estate rights unless otherwise provided by the law .
CARDINAL . Section CARDINAL § CARDINAL provides , inter alia , that the ownership title over a real estate is acquired by virtue of the recording .

CARDINAL . Section CARDINAL § CARDINAL provides that the removal of ownership title from the public records , on the ground that the recording was incorrect , may be initiated by an action within DATE from DATE when the real estate was recorded .
CARDINAL . Section CARDINAL provides , inter alia , that ORG ( ORG завод за геодетски работи ) is responsible for recording property rights over real estates .
CARDINAL . Section CARDINAL provides , inter alia , that the ORG shall record ownership rights over real estates .
